nodes.text: The Coduyo family was a Chiss family belonging to the Chiss Ascendancy's Great Families, although it once belonged to the Ruling Families. It possessed a centuries-old fleet. The Chiss mid-ager Coduyo'po'nekri and his betrothed Yomie were members of this family.
The Coduyo were allied with fellow Great Family the Xodlak family and the Ruling Irizi family.
